document.full_text: the ncaa has accused boise state of committing one major violation and a series of infractions over a five-year period in its football program and four other sports.
document.title: boise state responds to n.c.a.a. inquiry
lines_and_colors: the ncaa has accused boise state of committing one major violation and a series of infractions over a five-year period in its football program and four other sports.
